result.arabic_text: وَلَوۡ أَنَّهُمۡ ءَامَنُواْ وَٱتَّقَوۡاْ لَمَثُوبَةٞ مِّنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞۚ لَّوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ
result.translation: 103.yahuud Diggah usun Yallaa kee kay farmoyta Nummasseeh kay digaalak meesitinnay usun edde gabxitan Baabak Yallih xaqul tan galto Aysuk keenih Raaqak ten, usun woh Aaxaguk Suginnoonuy.
